paper_keywords: the existence of positive periodic solutions
the continuation theorem of coincidence degree theory
paper_abstract: In this paper, the existence of positive periodic solutions for a generalized delayed population model with stocking and feedback control is established by using the continuation theorem of coincidence degree theory. Then, by constructing a Lyapunov functional, the global attractivity of a positive periodic solution for the above model is established. (C) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Existence and global attractivity of a positive periodic solution for a generalized delayed population model with stocking and feedback control
